languages.text: {n}Соломон поглощен тем, что оттирает тряпицей кровь с аугментированной руки. Оторвав взгляд от импланта, он устало кивает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец?"
{n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон поглощен тем, что оттирает тряпицей кровь с аугментированной руки. Оторвав взгляд от импланта, он устало кивает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец?"

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、義手に付いた血を布切れでせっせと拭き取っている。彼は作業の手を止めて顔を上げ、疲れた様子であなたにうなずいた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、義手に付いた血を布切れでせっせと拭き取っている。彼は作業の手を止めて顔を上げ、疲れた様子であなたにうなずいた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wischt gerade mit einem Lumpen Blut von seinem augmentierten Arm. Er blickt auf und nickt dir ermüdet zu.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wischt gerade mit einem Lumpen Blut von seinem augmentierten Arm. Er blickt auf und nickt dir ermüdet zu.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne s'affaire à essuyer le sang qui recouvre son bras augmenté à l'aide d'un chiffon. Il relève les yeux et vous adresse un hochement de tête las.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne s'affaire à essuyer le sang qui recouvre son bras augmenté à l'aide d'un chiffon. Il relève les yeux et vous adresse un hochement de tête las.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ? »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne está ocupado limpiándose con un trapo la sangre del brazo aumentado. Levanta la mirada hacia ti y asiente fatigado.{/n} «¿Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne está ocupado limpiándose con un trapo la sangre del brazo aumentado. Levanta la mirada hacia ti y asiente fatigado.{/n} «¿Comerciante Independiente?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙手里拿着一块破布，忙着擦拭他满是植入物手臂上的血迹。见到你，他停下了手里的工作，抬起头来，向你疲惫地点了点头。{/n}“行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙手里拿着一块破布，忙着擦拭他满是植入物手臂上的血迹。见到你，他停下了手里的工作，抬起头来，向你疲惫地点了点头。{/n}“行商浪人？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, ogmentli kolundaki kanı bir bezle silmekle uğraşıyor. Kafasını kaldırıp sana başıyla selam veriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, ogmentli kolundaki kanı bir bezle silmekle meşgul. Kafasını kaldırıp sana başıyla selam veriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir?"

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is busy wiping blood from his augmented arm with a rag. He looks up from his task and gives you a tired nod.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"
